tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I was in acute pain when visited first time and was very very keen about treatment of a couple of teeth but the doctor suggested that there is only one tooth which is culprit...though I was not in the  mood to accept... and requested to do treatment for both the tooth. The doctor made me calm by saying," let's do it for one tooth and will decide afterwards....." And to my surprise, my pain just flew away with a single tooth treatment. 
I am really very thankful and I  bless the doctor for all the happiness for life.
reply_text: We're glad that we could solve your problem.. Thank you so much for the kind words..
